explains: adj. 不能想象的；过分的

sentences.en: Any thought of splitting up the company was unthinkable, they said.
sentences.cn: 他们说，任何分裂该公司的想法都是不可思议的。

sentences.en: To be exact — my husband's doctor uttered an unthinkable word: leukaemia.
sentences.cn: 确切地说，我丈夫的医生说了一个不可思议的词：白血病。

sentences.en: Encompassed in a luminous cloud, of which he was now merely the fiery heart, he swung through unthinkable arcs of oscillation, like a vast pendulum.
sentences.cn: 他现在只不过是一颗火热的心，被一团发光的云所包围，他像一个巨大的钟摆一样，在不可思议的摆动的弧线上摇摆。
